name: CopyFiles
description: Copy files from source folder to target folder using minimatch patterns (The minimatch patterns will only match file paths, not folder paths)
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: SourceFolder
inputs.label: Source Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Source folder to apply copy patterns to

inputs.name: Contents
inputs.label: Contents
inputs.helpMarkDown: File paths to include as part of the copy. Supports multiple lines of minimatch patterns. [More Information](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=613725)

inputs.name: TargetFolder
inputs.label: Target Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Target folder files will copy to

inputs.name: CleanTargetFolder
inputs.label: Clean Target Folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Delete all existing files in target folder before copy.

inputs.name: OverWrite
inputs.label: Over Write
inputs.helpMarkDown: Replace existing file in target folder
